definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Turn up the volume and listen closely.
Classic Fm is my favorite, please tune it in.
sentences.chinese: 古典調頻電臺是我的最愛，請調到那個頻段。

sentences.english: The contrast of the computer screen is too low, please adjust it.
sentences.chinese: 顯示器的對比度太低了，請調高一些吧。

sentences.english: The music is too loud. Please turn it down.
sentences.chinese: 音樂太吵人了，請調低點音吧。

sentences.english: Before you take photos, please adjust the focus of your camera.
sentences.chinese: 在照相之前請調準照相機的焦距。

sentences.english: Please regulate the sound on that radio.
sentences.chinese: 請調一下那個收音機的音量。

sentences.english: That music is too loud . Please turn it down.
Please modulate the sound on the TV.
sentences.chinese: 請調節一下電視機的音量。

sentences.english: Please regulate the sound of the radio.
sentences.chinese: 請調一下收音機的聲音。

sentences.english: Please call in police to restore order.
Raise the room temperature or use a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 所以請調高室內溫度或蓋一條毯子。

sentences.english: Oh, your hair dryer is too hot. Would you adjust it , please?
sentences.chinese: 哎呦，吹風太熱了，請調整一下吧。
